resources.string: The module is not activated. Please activate the module and try again
Are you sure to restart the system?
Are you sure to restart the scope application?
Requires reboot system to take effect
Always use the signature of the installed app when installing
Not ordinary dangerous, Enable only when absolutely needed
Turn off the signature verification when installing the application, you can install the tampered application
Allows direct overwriting of applications with different signatures of the same package name
Allows the app to directly overwrite the installation of the old version while installing the new version
Can solve the integrity verification inside some applications, generally do not need to be turned on
The wallpaper zoom magnification when the system desktop switch is applied
Make most apps support small window opening, need to check System launcher and SystemUI at the same time
Need to check the Gallery and Screenshot at the same time
Transition animation speed「When the app is turned on or off」
Transition animation speed「In and out of the background」

The speed of the transition animation that takes effect when entering and exiting the most recent task.Modifying this item on the desktop of some versions will cause abnormal deceleration or acceleration
The speed of the transition animation that takes effect when the application is opened and closed
Double-click to turn off the screen
Double-click the blank space on the desktop to turn off the screen.
Remove the "All" tab of the application group in the drawer
Remove the "Edit" button in the drawer to apply paging
It will be recognized as high-end by default. Turning this option on will not increase GPU performance overhead. Remove some logs at the same time.
Modify the animation effect of the recent task removal card
This will disable the effect that the wallpaper will gradually brighten from dimming when going in and out of the recent task
The application name that is too long will be scrolled and displayed without any new line
Press and hold the desktop icon to add a quick open window
Change the large round corner 2x1&1x2 icon designed by MIUI brain pumping to normal small round corner
Optimize the transition effect from lock screen to desktop when unlocking
Third-party themes and fonts are allowed to be applied, and the system framework needs to be checked and restarted at the same time.
Guess the ads in your favorite will be displayed as blank cards, and the ads in the rest will be completely removed
Remove the icon and camera function in the lower right corner of the lock screen interface
Remove the lock screen minus one screen
Remove the icon at the lower left corner of the lock screen and the negative screen function
Instantaneous current is displayed at the bottom of the lock screen during charging
The time of the position of the status bar is displayed in seconds, excluding the notification bar and the control center
Disable MIUI copying Apple\'s temporarily disable Bluetooth
Use Mix Alpha charge animation instead of default charge animation
Disable dynamic refresh rate to achieve global high frame rate except for camera
The specific temperature is displayed on the current temperature of the battery page of power saving and battery
Skip the waiting confirmation countdown time of most dangerous options.

-Only VAB models are supported. Please do not turn on other models 
-No internal test qualification is required to brush into the complete internal test package 
-Users with permissions will not be able to receive updates and can also be used to mask updates 
-Only used by the official system
Show notification importance settings which are hidden in MIUI
